lead_paragraph: Average revenue rose 4.1 percent in the first half of the year, according to Citi Private Bank’s quarterly report on the legal industry.

headline.print_headline: Higher Fees Increase Law Firm Revenue by 4.1 Percent
headline.main: Higher Fees Increase Law Firm Revenue by 4.1 Percent
